data.title: S&P 500 Index Options Product Specification
data.text:
U.S. Equities

Currently one of the largest U.S. equities market operators.

U.S. Options

Cboe provides four U.S.-listed cash equity options markets.

U.S. Futures

The home of volatility and corporate bond index futures.

Cboe Europe

A leading pan-European equity and derivatives exchange and clearing operator.

Fixed Income

A new interdealer trading platform for U.S. Treasuries.

Cboe Digital

Visit our Cboe Digital site to learn more about our US regulated unified platform for Digital Asset Spot and Derivatives Markets.

Cboe Market Data

Real-time data feeds from our markets across the globe.

Trade Alert

Options order-flow and volatility analysis with real-time context and insight.

Index Data

Streaming values of indices from Cboe and other providers.

Market Statistics

Dive into high-level current and historical data from our markets.

VIX Volatility Products

Access the widest array of volatility products including VIX futures and options.

S&P 500 Index Options

Capture U.S. stock market exposure with ease utilizing SPX suite of options with a variety of contract sizes, settlements, and expirations.

FLEX Options

Essential customized portfolio management tools that allow you to specify key contract terms.

Russell 2000 Index Options

Manage exposure to the small-cap segment of the U.S. equity universe on the Russell 2000.

LEAPS Options

Discover options products with expiration dates up to three years in the future.

MSCI Index Options

Efficiently manage global equity exposures or diversify your portfolio with options on global, international and regional indices.

Corporate Bond Futures

Gain greater capital-efficiency for managing exposure to U.S. high yield and investment grade corporate bond markets.

Nanos

Discover a simpler, more affordable way to trade options on the S&P 500 Index.

Retail Trader Suite

Discover the potential benefits of trading index options and futures.

Cboe Labs

Innovation Hub of financial market professionals and academic experts to partner on product development.

All Products

Manage risk, gain efficient exposure, or generate alpha with Cboe's suite of innovative and flexible products.

Global Listings

Access to global liquidity and capital for the purpose-driven Innovation Economy.

U.S. Listings

A best-in-class listing experience for companies and ETFs powering the purpose-driven Innovation Economy.

Canadian Listings External Link

Unparalleled listings support for next generation corporates and ETFs.

ETF Market Canada External Link

The definitive resource for up-to-date market analysis and data on all Canadian-listed ETFs.

U.K./European Listings

The first Pan-European listing venue for ETFs and ETPs.

U.S. Indices

Leader in the creation and dissemination of volatility and derivatives-based indices.

Benchmark Index Roll Information

Current year and historical data for Cboeâ€™s benchmark indices.

Index Data Feed

Streaming values of 1,500+ indices from Cboe and other index providers.

Implied Correlation

Measures the average expected correlation between the top 50 stocks in the SPX index.
